sentences.en: Daily facial exercises help her to retain the skin's elasticity.
sentences.cn: 每天做面部运动帮助她保持皮肤弹性。

sentences.en: Facial painting is an adaptation of the mask.
sentences.cn: 脸谱是由面具演变而来的.

sentences.en: For that matter, the facial hairs he chops off were produced by other cells.
sentences.cn: 就此而言, 他剃掉的脸上的毫毛是由别的细胞生产出来的.

sentences.en: He had surgery to correct a facial disfigurement.
sentences.cn: 他做了手术来弥补自己的面部缺陷。

sentences.en: I ended up in hospital with facial injuries.
sentences.cn: 我落得个面部受伤，进了医院。

sentences.en: Kehr bears a strong facial resemblance to her sister.
sentences.cn: 凯尔的容貌和她姐姐十分相像.

sentences.en: Neurotmesis designates complete transection of the facial nerve.
sentences.cn: 神经断伤表明为面神经的完全切断.

sentences.en: Send a recent facial photograph of yourself with your application.
sentences.cn: 随同申请寄一张正面近照.

sentences.en: She had a facial at the beauty parlor.
sentences.cn: 她在美容院做了一次美容.

sentences.en: She had suffered severe facial mutilations after an accident.
sentences.cn: 她在事故中被严重毁容。

sentences.en: The signs of the ordinary faint are marked facial pallor and moist cold skin.
sentences.cn: 普通昏厥的征象是脸色灰白、皮肤湿冷.

sentences.en: There are also many physical signs, most noticeably a change in facial features.
sentences.cn: 还有很多体貌特征，最明显的是面容的变化。

sentences.en: This kind of  facial cleanser  can constringe and clean the pores of face.
sentences.cn: 此款洗面奶能够收敛及清洁毛孔。

sentences.en: Trauma to the facial bones is often associated with a cerebrospinal fluid rhinorrhea.
sentences.cn: 面骨的外伤常并发脑脊液鼻漏.
维克托脸上的表情没有变化。

sentences.en: We can use our eyes and facial expressions to communicate virtually every subtle nuance of emotion there is.
sentences.cn: 我们用眼睛和面部表情几乎就能传达出情感上的每一丝微妙变化。

words.tran_cn: 有某种面孔或表情的；有…表面的
脸；表面；面子；面容；外观；威信
意外打击；（拳击中）面部所受的突然一击；铣刀盘
面部的，表面的；脸的，面部用的

trans.tran_en: on your face or relating to your face
if you have a facial, you have a beauty treatment in which your face is cleaned and creams are rubbed into it
